text: Markdorf is a town in Bodensee in Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg in southern Germany. The town is near Lake Constance. It is 10 km northwest of Friedrichshafen. It is at the foot of the Gehrenberg mountain. The current mayor of Markdorf is Georg Riedmann from the CDU since 2013. Markdorf was first mentioned in 817 AD. It got city rights since 1250. It was host to the church council before it was moved to Konstanz. == References == Category:Bodenseekreis
title: Markdorf
